library.name: FileIO
library.description: Library for interacting with the local disk or virtualized disks.

function.name: readText
function.arg: Path to a text file to read, either absolute or relative.
function.description: Reads the contents of a text file and returns it as a string.

function.name: writeText
function.arg: Path to a file to write.
Value to write to the file.
function.description: Writes a value to a file. If the file exists, it will be overwritten. Content overwrites all previous contents (does not append).

function.name: current
function.description: Returns a string indicating the path of the current working directory, which is the starting point of all relative path inputs to other FileIO functions.

function.name: list
function.description: Lists all the files and directories in the given directory.

function.name: isDirectory
function.arg: Path to a file or directory.
function.description: Returns a boolean indicating whether the given path is a directory or not.

function.name: exists
function.arg: Path to a file or directory.
function.description: Returns a boolean indicating whether the given path exists as either a file or directory.

function.name: join
function.arg: List of strings that represent a path
function.description: Joins the strings in the list with the current platform's directory separator character. Generally this is either '/' or '\'.
